name: GettysburgCollegeAcademics
0:
”Alexa, open Gettysburg College Academics”
”Alexa, is Computer Science a major with Gettysburg College Academics”
”Alexa, tell me about Computer Science with Gettysburg College Academics”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gettysburg college academics
des:
If you want to know if Gettysburg has a certain academic program, say "does Gettysburg have _". To find if Gettysburg College has a certain type of academic program, say "is _ a major". You can search this way for minors, programs, and dual majors as well. Additionally, one can search by letter, with an example search being "majors with c". Of course, you can search for minors, programs, and dual majors this way as well. 
Once you have found a certain academic program you are interested in, you can learn about it by saying "tell me about _". The app will then read chunks of text about the academic program, and you can navigate these by saying "next", "repeat", and "previous", so that you do not miss any important information. This skill not only allows you to figure out what academic programs Gettysburg has, but it also provides adequate descriptions of them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
